## pachctl stop job

Stop a job.

### Synopsis

Stop a job.  The job will be stopped immediately.

```
pachctl stop job <job> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for job
```

      --no-color   Turn off colors.
  -v, --verbose    Output verbose logs
